LandingPage.subtitle: Create a queue, share the link, and let your customers skip the line.

Dashboard.title: Your queues
Dashboard.description: Here are all your created queues

name.title: Name
name.description: Give your queue a name. You can change this later.

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe your queue. Markdown formatting is supported.

tickets.description: Here are all the tickets and their queue position. Press Next to push your queue forward.
